title: Teen accidently shot during target shooting in Lebanon
content: LEBANON, Ohio (WKRC) -- A teenager has been accidentally shot in Lebanon on Saturday.Two teenagers were reportedly target shooting on Wilmington Road and one was accidentally hit.The juvenile shot is still in the hospital, and there has been no word on his condition yet.Detectives are investigating and plan on releasing a statement on Monday.Follow us on Twitter @Local12 and LIKE us on Facebook for updates!
